name: Classic Apple Pie
description:
## Prepare apples
Peel, core and slice the apples.

## Make pie crust
Roll out pie dough and place in dish.

## Assemble pie
Add apples and sugar mixture.

## Bake
Bake until golden.

name: Chocolate Brownies
description:
## Prepare batter
Melt chocolate and butter, then mix with sugar and eggs.

## Bake
Bake until set.

## Cool and cut
Let cool before cutting into squares.

name: Vegan Chocolate Mousse
description:

description:

name: Vegan Banana Ice Cream
description:

name: High-Protein Greek Yogurt Parfait
description:
## Layer ingredients
Layer yogurt, berries, and honey.

description:

Whisk eggs in a bowl.
